about_the_game:
BATSUMARU is a short and minimalist puzzle game. This Demo contains the first 10 levels of the game and teases a few of the later game mechanics. I hope that by playing this demo, you will get a good idea of what the game experience will be like!

Thank you for playing, I hope you enjoy it. \ (´～｀)/

~Tyler Rae
detailed_description:
BATSUMARU is a short and minimalist puzzle game. This Demo contains the first 10 levels of the game and teases a few of the later game mechanics. I hope that by playing this demo, you will get a good idea of what the game experience will be like!

Thank you for playing, I hope you enjoy it. \ (´～｀)/

~Tyler Rae

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: At least a vegetable pc, please
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: BATSUMARU is a short and minimalist puzzle game. This is the Demo!
